ComicInfo.Summary: Rachael starts to pack her bags without a word to chuck who is bewildered and when he finally takes a stand and demands an answer Rachael breaks out the Parker Girl nose hold on him. Francine wakes in a bed without Katchoo, who is in L.A. and promptly smashes the alarm clock, which brings a smile to her face. At work she finds Rachael gone and that she wasn't the bog-wig she thoughts she was in the company. Katchoo recalls when in a bar in L.A. drinks her self unconscious only to be hoisted over Tambi's shoulder and carried out. That bar is now up for lease and she walks on. Francine talks to Katchoo on the phone and gives her the news about Rachael being moved by the parent company Packard-Yerr. Katchoo immediately makes the connection that it is an anagram. Francine is shocked when she works out that its 'Darcy Parker'.
ComicInfo.Title: The Very Thing That Makes Her Rich
